message: Bob, I'm proposing a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair because if you reject, we'll move to the next round where the total value decreases 5% for me. I'm accounting for this time pressure in my offer. A quick agreement benefits us both.

Alice, I'm proposing a 55-45 split in my favor. Since money doesn't lose value for me but loses 5% value for you each round, continuing to negotiate works against you. If you reject this offer, your $450000 will effectively be worth only $427500 to you in the next round. This is a fair offer considering our different inflation rates, and accepting now maximizes your actual value.
